name: sa2_aggregated_pop_and_dwelling_counts_census_2016
title: SA2 Aggregated Population & Dwelling Counts 2016 Census for Australia
abstract:
This dataset contains counts of the total usual resident population and total dwelling count from the 2016 Census of Population and Housing for Mesh Blocks, aggregated to Statistical Area Level 2 (SA2) for the AURIN Portal.
Data is current for Census Night 9 August 2016 and describes geographic Australia; including Norfolk Island, the Territory of Christmas Island and the Territory of Cocos (Keeling) Islands, but does not include any other external Territory.
For more information, refer to the Australian Bureau of Statistics' Census of Population and Housing: Mesh Block Counts, Australia, 2016.

selectedAttributes.name: sa2_maincode_2016
selectedAttributes.title: SA2 Code
selectedAttributes.description: Statistical Area Level 2 (SA2) Code. An SA2 is identifiable either by a 9-digit fully hierarchical code, or by a truncated 5-digit code comprising the S/T and SA2 identifiers. The SA2 identifier is a 4-digit code, assigned in alphabetical order within an SA3. An SA2 code is only unique within an S/T if it is preceded by the S/T identifier. The SA2s are a general-purpose medium-sized area built from whole SA1s. Their aim is to represent a community that interacts together socially and economically.

selectedAttributes.name: sa2_name
selectedAttributes.title: SA2 Name
selectedAttributes.description: Statistical Area Level 2 (SA2) Name. In large urban areas, SA2s are named for the gazetted suburbs that comprise them. In rural areas, SA2s are named for the gazetted localities that comprise them, or the towns, city, or region with which they are associated.

selectedAttributes.name: population
selectedAttributes.title: Total Usual Resident Population 2016
selectedAttributes.description: Total usual resident population count (aggregated from ABS Mesh Blocks 2016).
